alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Clayton; Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 10:50PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeast Iowa and far southwest Wisconsin through 1145 PM CDT... At 1049 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles east of Lansing to near Stanley. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oelwein, Prairie Du Chien, Elkader, Lansing, Postville, Monona, Fayette, Strawberry Point, McGregor, Garnavillo, Elgin, Clermont, Maynard, Arlington, Marquette, Harpers Ferry, Farmersburg, Volga, Hardin and Bridgeport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern Iowa. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southwestern Wisconsin.
